ClassDesc: Class with information if a node is a range. Use @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityNodeInfo#RangeInfo#obtain_E@ to get an instance. Recycling is handled by the @B_android#view#accessibility#AccessibilityNodeInfo_E@ to which this object is attached.
